text: target_dir character: directory cache files stored. patch, like gls$OUT_SVY_DIR_PC gls list: List globals. cache_ids character:vector  Cache_ids. default db_create_pipeline_inventory() pipload::add_gls_to_env() one two shortcuts, "" "". former refers gls$CACHE_SVY_DIR_PC. latter refers gls$OUT_SVY_DIR_PC. verbose logical: whether display messages delete logical NULL.
